div.p: This papyrus has been digitally edited in the webinar Digital Editions of Greek Literary and Paraliterary Papyri taught by Rodney Ast and Holger Essler. Revision by Holger Essler.

χειν τὸν Καινέα. δύνα

ωνι τῶι διὰ Κορίνθου
